title: Country Escape in the Heart of the Barossa Valley
description: Explore one of Australia’s most renowned wine regions and escape to the Barossa Valley with a stay at Lyndoch Hill, a beautiful motel nestled in one of the country’s biggest rose gardens. Leave the city behind and enjoy a peaceful getaway surrounded by nature with daily breakfast and fabulous dining discounts.
offer_address: Corner of Hermann Thumm Drive and Barossa Valley Way, 5351 Lyndoch, Australia

title: Country Escape in the Heart of the Barossa Valley
description: Experience the country charms of the Barossa Valley staying at Lyndoch Hill, a beautiful motel nestled among one of Australia’s biggest rose gardens. Leave the city behind and enjoy one, two or three nights amid nature with daily breakfast and a guaranteed late check out.
offer_address: Corner of Hermann Thumm Drive and Barossa Valley Way, 5351 Lyndoch, Australia
